title: kindred splash art is not workimg
body:
i know kindred is not yet released, but normally i can still see their splash art. if i go to kindred''s i can see the skin's splash art, but not the main one.

hope you fix it quick

replies.body: The main skin for some reason is super zoomed in on the left side.

Hey Otter4Blue,

Thanks for the report! We're working to get this fixed for when Kindred's released. :]
